channel.title: Need 3 help
channel.description:
1. Howe i can make a shop and put in the shop iteams ? :confused: 2. Were is some web like this http://client.silabsoft.org/ or moparscape.com ??? 3. howe i can make more monster ? 4. what is the best sourse if you use ? put the link.
I'am sorry for my bad english becouse i'am from lithuanian....
THAKS FOR HELP !!!!! :) :) :)

item.title: Need 3 help
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

A1) Go to shop.cfg or whatever it’s called and edit that (you’ll know what to do)
A2) Dodian is another webclient
A3) Find NPCSpawn.cfg and edit that. (you’ll know what to do)
A4) Most Popular atm is RuneJava 3.0.

Note: If you use RuneJava, the Npc spawn list is found in Data\Npcs\Spawn (Add it in any of the .list files).
And the shop list is found in Data\Shops\ (Add it in the shops.list file). Hope that helped

Read full topic
